query: SELECT id, version, LENGTH(JSON_UNQUOTE(content)) as content_length, LEFT(JSON_UNQUOTE(content), 100) as content_start FROM frameworks WHERE subjectId = (SELECT id FROM subjects WHERE code = 'economia_politica') ORDER BY updatedAt DESC LIMIT 1
